title: Event Planner
status: Full Time, 40 hours per week(year round 239 day calendar)EDUCATION and/or EXPERIENCEAssociate's Degree or equivalent and two years related experience and/or training; or equivalent combination of education and experience.  Experience working in event planning, hospitality, or communications preferred.The salary for this position is assigned to Level 10 of the SC Salary Schedule.To view the salary schedule, please select the following linkSC Salary Schedule.Attachment(s):Events Planner.pdfEmail To A FriendPrint Version
